topic.title: Backing up users.json doesn't backup zeroid.
topic.body: Using Zeronet on Android. When I backup my zeronet users.json file and copy and paste it back in  to the data folder it doesn't reclver my zeroid, and the files menu doesn't report a zeroid file in the list. I had to back up my entire zero folder to recover my zeroid. So I now have 101MB of data just to back up an account. Any ideas why the users json wont preserve zeroid?

topic.title: Because of censorship, I downloaded the Panodrama video and seeded it to a torrent.
topic.body:
Because of increased censorship I decided to download the Panodrama documentary from Tommy Robinson's YouTube channel and seed it to a torrent.

The download is a zip containing the streams, there is a 720p version with audio and a 1080P dash stream without audio. If anyone has linux and ffmpeg there are instructions in the readme how to create a 1080P version with audio.

Here's the magnet link: 

magnet:?xt=urn:btih:314bdef6fc0837b0e23c4fa4f4bedc92dcab0148&dn=Panodrama%20Full%20Movie%20Reupload.zip&ln=1028511328&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.openbittorrent.com%3A80%2Fannounce&tr=http%3A%2F%2Fbt.home-ix.ru%2Fannounce.php&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.istole.it%3A80%2Fannounce

1553709570_15xzQzPrA8KgEdqhVBnNvhtL6cWPa.body: Ok. Works now. But how do I make multiple zeroid accounts? Even when I have no certificate selected Zeroid thinks I still want to be signed in with that user name.

1554309286_15xzQzPrA8KgEdqhVBnNvhtL6cWPa.body:
I reuploaded this to Mega.nz, like you guys asked so you guys could seed this as well.

https://mega.nz/#!aQd3xCha!-H25h60mjXtquB5mqsOyywgxi-PyozgbRxygxhKfaMs
